title: Enchanting "Pushpa Latha" Fancy Diamond Jhumka Earrings
materials: 18K Rose Gold with GH color diamonds
features: Floral cascade design resembling a blossoming vine. Features a brilliant-cut diamond centerpiece at the top, cascading into fancy colored diamonds. The design culminates in a pink diamond flower motif with a single, lustrous pearl hanging gently below. Modern Jhumka design with a touch of traditional South Indian flower (Pushpa) artistry.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to add a touch of modern elegance with a floral theme. Suitable for both sarees and western gowns.
description: A unique and contemporary take on the traditional Jhumka. The floral design and fancy colored diamonds make it a standout piece. The rose gold enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and the luster of the pearl. This piece is perfect for the modern woman who appreciates traditional artistry.
